body_content.explanation: a long, narrow, flat piece of wood or similar material, of the type used for making floors:
examples: We used a plank to cross the ditch.

body_content.explanation: an important principle on which the activities of a group, especially a political group, are based:
examples: Educational reform was one of the main planks of their election campaign.
The party's policy is based on five central planks.

body_content.explanation: an exercise in which you hold your body straight and parallel to the floor while resting on your toes and hands or elbows:
examples: Planks are very good for strengthening your core.
